<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82324</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82324</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>9751</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pastimes – Interactive Questioning</string>
            <string language="es">Pasatiempos – Cuestionario interactivo</string>
            <string language="ga">Caitheamh Aimsire  - Ceistiúchán Idirghníomhach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeitvertreibe? Interaktives Ausfragen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Passe-temps ? Interrogation Interactive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pastimes? Questionar Interativo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pastimes? Interrogazione Interattiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χόμπι; Διαλογική επερώτηση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The pupil will revise the theme of Weather. The pupil will use interactive resources to encourage reading. The pupil will have an opportunity to do functional reading. Written questions will be used to assess the understanding of the pupil.</string>
            <string language="es">El alumno revisará el tema del tiempo. Utilizará recursos interactivos que le estimulen a leer. El alumno tendrá la oportunidad de hacer una lectura funcional. Se utilizarán preguntas escritas para evaluar la comprensión del alumno. Los alumnos podrán cor</string>
            <string language="ga">Déanfaidh an páiste dul siar ar an téama, Aimsir.Bainfidh an páiste úsáid as acmhainn idirghníomhach chun an léitheoireacht a chothú. Beidh deis ag an bpáiste léitheoireacht feidhmiúil a dhéanamh. Beidh úsáid á dhéanamh as ceisteanna scríofa chun tuiscint an pháiste a mheasúnú. Beidh ar chumas an pháiste féincheartú a dhéanamh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Pupille verbessert das Thema des Wetters. 
Die Pupille benutzt interaktive Betriebsmittel, um Messwert 
anzuregen. Die Pupille hat eine Gelegenheit, Funktionsmesswert 
zu tun. Schriftliche Fragen werden verwendet, um das 
Verständnis der Pupille festzusetzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La pupille mettra à jour le thème de 
Survivent à. La pupille emploiera les ressources 
interactives pour encourager la lecture. La pupille aura une 
occasion de faire la lecture fonctionnelle. Des questions 
écrites seront employées pour évaluer l'arrangement de la pupille.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A pupila revisará o tema do tempo. A 
pupila usará recursos interativos incentivar a leitura. A 
pupila terá uma oportunidade de fazer a leitura funcional. As 
perguntas escritas serão usadas avaliar a compreensão da pupila.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La pupilla modificherà il tema di tempo. 
La pupilla userà le risorse interattive per consigliare alla 
lettura. La pupilla avrà un'occasione fare la lettura 
funzionale. Le domande scritte saranno usate per valutare la 
comprensione della pupilla.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο μαθητής θα αναθεωρήσει το θέμα του καιρού. Ο 
μαθητής θα χρησιμοποιήσει τα διαλογικά στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς για 
να ενθαρρύνει την ανάγνωση. Ο μαθητής θα έχει μια ευκαιρία 
να κάνει τη λειτουργική ανάγνωση. Οι γραπτές ερωτήσεις θα 
χρησιμοποιηθούν για να αξιολογήσουν την κατανόηση του μαθητή.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Irlandais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Irlandese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιρλανδικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
